metadata.title: CVE-2024-0641 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability was found in tipc_crypto_key_revoke innet/tipc/crypto.c in the Linux kernelâ€™s TIPC subsystem. This flaw allowsguests with local user privileges to trigger a deadlock and potentiallycrash the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
